sentences.english: This is just a small glimpse into some of his accolades as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 这些只是他作为一名艺人，所获成就的小小一瞥。

sentences.english: Labels therefore had a unique force over artists.
sentences.chinese: 所以唱片公司对艺人有独特的强制力。

sentences.english: Also respect the space of other buskers.
sentences.chinese: 也不要侵占其他街头艺人的空间。

sentences.english: Yang Shulin is a gourd pyrography artist in Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 杨淑林，现居石景山区，葫芦烙画艺人。

sentences.english: In the old days, street musicians often used this method in order to play while walking.
sentences.chinese: 在旧社会，街头艺人常用这种方式边走边拉。

sentences.english: Dough is kneaded and then molded into little cute animals by this folk artisan.
sentences.chinese: 民间艺人搓捏为一个个可爱的小动物。

sentences.english: That was the voice of Horne the entertainer.
sentences.chinese: 这就是霍恩作为一个艺人的心声。

sentences.english: Busking is a fun activity for the performer.
sentences.chinese: 街头表演对于街头艺人来说是一项有乐趣的活动。

sentences.english: Below, the crowd was flinging coins at the jugglers.
sentences.chinese: 他们下面，围观人群向杂耍艺人扔着硬币。

sentences.english: The RIAA represents record companies and their performers.
sentences.chinese: 美国唱片行业协会是唱片公司和艺人的代表。

sentences.english: A lot of good street performers live and perform in San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 很多优秀的街头艺人在旧金山生活和表演。

sentences.english: Hungry undead craftsmen all over the world, also just hungry undead.
sentences.chinese: 天下饿不死手艺人，也只是饿不死而已。

sentences.english: I have never liked any artiste so much before.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都没有那么喜欢过一个艺人。

sentences.english: He's a personable entertainer and I hope people see that in him.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位风度翩翩的艺人而我希望人们能这样看他。

sentences.english: There is no guarantee that those who have been selected and groomed will be confirmed as an artiste.
sentences.chinese: 学校将不保证参赛者在接受培训后会成为艺人。

sentences.english: Please support the TV stations, producers and artists.
sentences.chinese: 请支持各电视台，监制及艺人。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
role of vivacious young female in Chinese opera
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
